attributes.action: Cancel Love Island since euro 2020 has been cancelled
attributes.additional_details: Because euro 2020 has been cancelled so it's only fair
attributes.background: Cancel Love Island due to coronavirus

rejection.details:
Decisions about broadcasting particular television programmes are a matter for individual broadcasters, not the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
